title: Siegel Rewards Program, Free utilities included, Free premium cable TV
posting_body: ['Bonanza Apartments in Las Vegas', 'Low Weekly & Monthly Rates', 'FREE Utilities', 'Free Premium Cable TV', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Additional Information:', '<URL>', 'Apartment Home Features', '-Laundry Facility', '-No long term lease required', '-On Las Vegas CAT bus line', '-Free premium cable TV', '-Siegel Rewards Program', '-Fully furnished and unfurnished apartments', '-Free utilities included', '-Large studio apartments', '-BBQ area and gazebo', '-Elevator to upper level apartments', '-Sparkling swimming pool', '-Full kitchen in apartment', 'Free Siegel Reward Program', 'Earn points every time you pay your rent or refer a friend.', 'Use your points to treat yourself to', 'free rent, food, movies, gift cards', ', and much more!', 'Pet Policy', '20lb weight limit and aggressive breeds such as Pit Bulls and Rottweilers are prohibited.', 'Managed by The Siegel Group', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.']
